channel.title: Escape 718 /742
channel.description:
This is a 718 server running on a 742 cache/client! It is a great server with many shops and bosses to fight with customs added in! It is a mature server so you can come in and chill and just have fun! I wont allow drama! :mad: [u]Some Info About The Server[/u] In-Game Highscores In-Game Drop Log Added Dwarf Cannon & Royal Cannon Prestige System Summoning Completionist Cape Requirements Skiller Cape Requirements Trivia Game via World message Lost-City Quest Bones on altar Every skill trainable/working Squeal Of Fortune Abyss +ALOT MORE!! You must join!
website: [url=http://escape718.enjin.com]http://escape718.enjin.com[/url] webclient: [url=http://escape718.enjin.com]http://escape718.enjin.com[/url] THE DOWNLOADABLE CLIENT IS ON THE WEBSITE!
I look forward to see you on there!
